nodes.title: II.2. Superficial structures: Primarily funerary superstructure
Funerary Structure FS2
nodes.body: Funerary structure FS2 (10.5 m x 9.5 m) has a forward flank raised 2 m above the downhill slope (14.449΄ / 21.744΄). The rear flank is elevated about 1 m above the uphill slope. There is a slight depression on top of his structure.

nodes.title: Funerary Structure FS3
nodes.body: Funerary structure FS3 (5.9 m x 5.9 m) has a forward flank elevated about 1.5 m above the slope, while the rear flank is flush with the slope (14.441΄ / 21.731΄).

nodes.title: Funerary Structure FS4
nodes.body: Funerary structure FS4 (6.7 m x 5.3 m) has a forward flank elevated about 1.5 m above the downhill slope, while its rear flank is slightly elevated above the uphill slope (14.437΄ / 21.730΄).

nodes.title: Funerary Structure FS5
nodes.body: Funerary structure FS5 (9.7 m x 6.9 m) has a forward flank elevated about 1.5 m above the downhill slope, while its rear flank is slightly elevated above the uphill slope (14.426΄ / 21.735΄).

nodes.title: Funerary Structure FS6
nodes.body: Funerary structure FS6 (11.1 m x 7.6 m) a forward flank elevated about 1.5 m above the downhill slope, while its rear flank is slightly elevated above the uphill slope (14.409΄ / 21.719΄).
